phrs.translation: 冰山一角；事物的表面部分

sentences.sentence: The above complaints are, I suspect, just the tip of the iceberg.
sentences.translation: 上述的这些抱怨，我觉得，不过是冰山的一角。

sentences.sentence: Unless we're all a lot more careful, the people who have died so far will be just the tip of the iceberg.
sentences.translation: 除非我们大家都更加小心，否则迄今为止已经死去的人数将只是冰山一角。

sentences.sentence: As for spinosaurus, diet was just the tip of the evolutionary iceberg.
sentences.translation: 对于棘龙来说，饮食只是进化的冰山一角。
